All incoming freshman are invited to attend our LINK Crew/Freshman Orientation day on July 31st. We ask that all incoming freshman arrive at 9:00 am at the Fauria Gym (the new gym). There will be activities, opportunities to join clubs and athletic teams, team building activities and more. Each incoming freshman will be assigned a junior/senior mentor to help them navigate their high school experience.

Pedimos que todos los estudiantes de primer año que lleguen lleguen a las 9:00 am al gimnasio Fauria (el nuevo gimnasio). Habrá actividades, oportunidades para unirse a clubes y equipos atléticos, actividades de formación de equipos y más. A cada estudiante de primer año entrante se le asignará un mentor junior / senior para ayudarles a navegar en su experiencia de escuela secundaria.

Riverbank Unified School District invites you to the grand opening of the Parent Networking Center located on the Cardozo Middle School campus on Wednesday, August 30th. RHS 50th Celebration

RHS is celebrating 50 Years of Excellence. We are looking to highlight achievements of our school and students throughout the years. Please send your stories about former students, special events or interesting anecdotes to Stacy Bauer. She is hoping to put together a timeline. If you are interested in planning or just want to join in on the fun, go to the official Facebook page and join in. https://www.facebook.com/rhs50thanniversary/

Thanks for Serving RUSD Students for 15+ Years

For the 3rd consecutive year, the District held a luncheon for all employees. Employees who have served the District for 15, 20, 25 and 30 years were recognized for their service. The following employees were recognized:
15 Years of Service: Joe Barney, Donna Bigelow, Angela Hadley, Beth Perkins Jose Solis Reyes, Paul Sosa
20 Years of Service:Martha Abarca, Penny Bartholomew, Richard Beatty, Anita Calderon, Gail Forest, Hope Galvez, Diana Gonzalez, Maria Lopez, Chris McMenimen, Nancy Morgan, Elodia Puga, Dana Rapisura, Rosa Solorio, Lisa Threet, Laura Wright
25 Years of Service:Ralph Contreras, Pam Miller, Susan Morgan, Patricia Trujillo-West, Yolanda Vera
30 Years of Service: Marisa Moya, Bridget Price

Thank you to our partners for their generous donations: Lozano Smith, Attorney's at Law, Timothy P. Huff & Associates, Inc., Capitol PFG, i-Ready (CAINC), O'Brien's Supermarket-Riverbank, Save Mart Supermarket-Riverbank, Starbucks-Riverbank, Starbucks-Modesto, Krispy Kreme-Brentwood
